info.author: Christian Zaldivar
info.keywords: OpenAI, LLM, LLM client, LLM app, QA, Agent, LLM agent
info.name: contextqa
requires_dist: triton==2.3.1; python_version < "3.12" and platform_system == "Linux" and platform_machine == "x86_64"

greenlet==3.0.3; python_version < "3.13" and platform_machine == "aarch64" or (platform_machine == "ppc64le" or (platform_machine == "x86_64" or (platform_machine == "amd64" or (platform_machine == "AMD64" or (platform_machine == "win32" or platform_machine == "WIN32")))))
deprecated==1.2.14; python_version >= "2.7" and python_version not in "3.0, 3.1, 3.2, 3.3"
httplib2==0.22.0; python_version >= "2.7" and python_version not in "3.0, 3.1, 3.2, 3.3"
python-dateutil==2.9.0.post0; python_version >= "2.7" and python_version not in "3.0, 3.1, 3.2, 3.3"
six==1.16.0; python_version >= "2.7" and python_version not in "3.0, 3.1, 3.2, 3.3"
coloredlogs==15.0.1; python_version >= "2.7" and python_version not in "3.0, 3.1, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4"
humanfriendly==10.0; python_version >= "2.7" and python_version not in "3.0, 3.1, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4"
jsonpatch==1.33; python_version >= "2.7" and python_version not in "3.0, 3.1, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6"
info.summary: Chat with your data by leveraging the power of LLMs and vector databases
